name: Death State
description:
This was my first project using shmup creator. The whole level was basically a tutorial for me to get familiar with the engine. It is one level and sprites are taken from Dodonpachi unlimited. In future projects i will use my own or bought assets.

The music was made by myself and is actually a part of Omega Wing which is developed by Prince of Mars ( also on itch.io). I am working on Omega Wing as a musician.
